name: Enhanced Research Paper Analysis System
description: Designed a RAG-based system to analyze research papers and enable contextual Q&A using Llama Chat HF 7B and LangChain.

name: Automated Diagnosis for Skin Diseases
technologies: Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, OpenCV, Hugging Face
description: Built an AI pipeline to diagnose skin diseases and generate diagnostic reports using ViT and multimodal models like PaliGemma.

name: Blinkit Groceries Real-Time Data Analysis
description: Developed interactive dashboard analyzing Blinkit's grocery data including sales trends, item counts, and ratings.
